Title: Not On Your Wife Opening Night
Plot: At a community theater, the onstage farce trickles into real life as Kyle promises to help his old mentor by romancing a wealthy female patron with the funds to save the theater.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: Rachael Harris, Jim Piddock, Sarah Burns, Zandy Hartig, Rob Huebel, Kerri Kenney, Jillian Armenante
